title: Anna and the Dancing Goose
description: Anna loves everything about Easter. Her grandmother brings her Easter eggs and a gift-a music box with a goose dancing inside a blue egg. Anna is curious, so her grandmother tells her the story of the dancing goose. Students will have the opportunity to sequence events and reflect on family connections in this story within a story.
reviewWords: alone, always, brought, dancing, hurt, music box
comprehension: Sequence Events                : Sequence events in the story
awareness: Segment Onset and Rime                : Segment onset and rime
phonics: Consonant Digraphs : Identify and read words that contain consonant digraph sh
grammar: Past-Tense Verbs                : Recognize and use past-tense verbs
wordWork: Onomatopoeia                : Recognize and give examples of onomatopoeia
